Text:
I spelled wrongly one of the two trackers addresses,  It works anyway because the other tracker address is spelled right, but you may see some 'tracker connection problem' in your client (that's about *one* of the two tracker addresses, so don't worry)

you can get both tracker addresses to work: right click on the line of this download, go to 'properties' and edit the lower tracker line adding an 'e' at the end (/announce instead of /announc )
You seem to be working very diligently at showing us how to cause harm. Then you play that innocent "information/education only" game. I suspect you are just another needful loser. d, eh?

The "innocent game" thing is needed. Without that, someone could say that it's *my* fault if you choose to use that information the wrong way.
I'm not telling anyone to harm themselves or anyone else; yet, knowing *how* to do that *may* be useful.
Maybe I'm a "needful loser"  (whatever *that* is) and maybe I'm not, that doesn't really matter. What *does* matter is that hundreds, probably thousands of people are downloading my files, and I hope that at least some of them will use them the "right" way, i.e. the way *I* consider right, which is ...reading them for fun only, and not actually use them :P
Seems to me that this file is more written for the kind of person that doesn't want to understand anything but only mix the magic ingredients and get the results.

Not commenting on the morality here, but...

For everyones sake, anyone attempting any chemical recipies should understand exactly what each step in the systhesis is supposed to do: buy a good 'a'level chemistry book first ;)
